subject: Having problem with Test Suite - Will you please help me
msgSnippet: Hello All: I have created two test classes: AccountJU and TestGame and tested them individually. I have created another suite class AllTest.class and added the
messageBody:
Hello All:
I have created two test classes: AccountJU and
TestGame and tested them individually. I have created
another suite class AllTest.class and added the above
two classes to the suite. Unfortunately I am getting
the following error.
I know I am making mistakes. But i do not know how to
figure it iut. Will any one please help me to fix
this.

Error Message:
==============
.F
Time: 0.01
There was 1 failure:
1)
warning(junit.framework.TestSuite$1)junit.framework.AssertionFailedError:
No tests found in AllTests
at AllTests.main(AllTests.java:9)

FAILURES!!!
Tests run: 1, Failures: 1, Errors: 0



The code:
========
import junit.framework.*;

public class AllTest extends TestCase {

public static void main(String[] args) {
junit.textui.TestRunner.run(new
TestSuite(AllTest.class));
}

public static Test Suite() {
TestSuite suite = new TestSuite();

suite.addTest(new TestSuite(AccountJU.class));
suite.addTest(new TestSuite(TestGame.class));
return suite;
}

} // End of class
